trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the value and location of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" /> cell for use when copying content to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Encapsula o valor e o local de uma célula <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" /> para usar ao copiar o conteúdo para a Área de Transferência.

trans-unit.source: This structure is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRowClipboardEventArgs.ClipboardRowContent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Essa estrutura é usada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRowClipboardEventArgs.ClipboardRowContent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The data item for the row that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: O item de dados para a linha que contém a célula sendo copiada.

trans-unit.source: The column that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: A coluna que contém a célula sendo copiada.

trans-unit.source: The text value of the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: O valor de texto da célula sendo copiado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the column that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coluna que contém a célula sendo copiada.

trans-unit.source: The column that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: A coluna que contém a célula sendo copiada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text value of the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor de texto da célula sendo copiado.

trans-unit.source: The text value of the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: O valor de texto da célula sendo copiado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instance to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: A instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> a ser comparada com a instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current and specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instances are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: Indica se as instâncias atual e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> especificada são equivalentes.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current and specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instances have the same <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content" /> property values; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se as instâncias atual e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> especificada tiverem os mesmos valores de propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content" />, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash para essa instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" />.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: O código hash para essa instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" />.

trans-unit.source: The hash code is based on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: O código hash se baseia o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content%2A> valores de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data item for the row that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o item de dados para a linha que contém a célula sendo copiada.

trans-unit.source: The data item for the row that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: O item de dados para a linha que contém a célula sendo copiada.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instance to be compared.
trans-unit.target: A primeira instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instance to be compared.
trans-unit.target: A segunda instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instances are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: Indica se as instâncias <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> especificadas são equivalentes.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instances have the same <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content" /> property values; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se as instâncias <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> especificada tiverem os mesmos valores de propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content" />, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instance to be compared.
trans-unit.target: A primeira instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instance to be compared.
trans-unit.target: A segunda instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instances are not equivalent.
trans-unit.target: Indica se as instâncias <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> especificadas não são equivalentes.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current and specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> instances do not have the same <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content" /> property values; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se as instâncias atual e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent" /> especificada não tiverem os mesmos valores de propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content" />, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.
